Sentencas: Composite electrolytes with nominal compositions, Ce0.8Gd0.2O1.9 + xBaO (x = 0.2 and 0.3), have been synthesized through the citrate route.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructure and electrical conductivity in composite electrolytes containing Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: Formation of two phases, namely Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate, has been confirmed through XRD and SEM studies.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructure and electrical conductivity in composite electrolytes containing Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: The impedance spectra show three distinct semi-circles, all originating from the composite electrolytes.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructure and electrical conductivity in composite electrolytes containing Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: In the temperature range 175-350 degrees C, the activation energies for the conductivity values extracted from the high frequency and intermediate frequency parts of the impedance spectra remains the same, irrespective of compositional and micro-structural variation.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructure and electrical conductivity in composite electrolytes containing Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: On the other hand, the activation energies for the conductivity values associated with the low frequency impedance spectra show a significant change with micro-structural variation.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructure and electrical conductivity in composite electrolytes containing Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate

Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells constructed using these composite electrolytes exhibit a higher open circuit voltage compared to those based on single phase 20 mol% Gd-doped ceria.
Titulo: Correlation between microstructure and electrical conductivity in composite electrolytes containing Gd-doped ceria and Gd-doped barium cerate
